fn.p: Abbreviations correspond to USGS codes for the assessment areas.
EUMETSAT Ocean and Sea Ice Satellite Application Facility. Global sea ice concentration reprocessing dataset 1978-2015 (v1.2, 2015). Available from http://osisaf.met.no.
Centre de Recherche et d'Exploitation Satellitaire (CERSAT), at IFREMER, PlouzanĂŠ (France) covering 1991-present. Available from http://www.ifremer.fr.
Cost components considered in the cost estimation are included in Table S2.
